akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment Not later than 6 months after June 22, 2009, the Secretary shall establish a 12-member advisory committee, to be known as the Tobacco Products Scientific Advisory Committee (in this section referred to as the “Advisory Committee”).
(c) Duties The Tobacco Products Scientific Advisory Committee shall provide advice, information, and recommendations to the Secretary—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Proceedings of advisory panels and committees

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Proceedings of advisory panels and committees The Advisory Committee shall make and maintain a transcript of any proceeding of the panel or committee. Each such panel and committee shall delete from any transcript made under this subsection information which is exempt from disclosure under section 552(b) of title 5.
